reviewText: For years I have tried to find these episodes from the discontinued pbs series. I have seen many versions of the history of rock and this is the best. Crossroads is the British  blues from early Clapton,Mayall. The Yardbirds,Animals and other British blues  groups are featured with some great interviews and clips. Blues In Technicolor is worth the price alone. Great interviews and clips of pychedelic bands is very entertaining. Jefferson Airplane,Big Brother,Greatful Dead and others are featured. It would be great if these were available on dvd. It took me years to find these.
